segments.text: Me , too , I can ’ t stop scratching . They are everywhere ! Sneaky little jerks .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have any bug spray ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I forgot to buy some .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Then we ’ ll have to put up with it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can cover ourselves with beer ! That way if they bite us , they ’ ll get drunk and fall asleep .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s without a doubt , the best idea you ’ Ve had ! Let ’ s do it !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Run ! They are thirsty for more !
segments.speaker: S2
